tasks.label: Build CCM EdgeVision (MSVC)
args: if not exist build mkdir build && cl src\*.cpp /Fo:build\ /I include /I C:\opencv\build\include /Fe:build\ccm_edgevision.exe /link /LIBPATH:C:\opencv\build\x64\vc16\lib opencv_world4120.lib

tasks.label: Build CCM EdgeVision (Linux)
args: mkdir -p build && g++ src/*.cpp -o build/ccm_edgevision -std=c++17 -I include `pkg-config --cflags --libs opencv4`
